title: Latest Fire TV software update reportedly blocks custom launchers
content:
Amazon Fire TV Sticks are some of the most popular streaming dongles on the market, and there are a few to choose from on Amazon. The 4K streaming dongle, in particular, brings support for HDR10+, Dolby Vision, and Dolby Atmos. Developers have also had a great time with them, figuring out how to unlock the

The post Latest Fire TV software update reportedly blocks custom launchers appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The latest Fire TV software update reportedly blocks custom launchers, nearly two years after the last workaround was found.
